name: Mothing Really Matters
description:
Oh no! There are moths in the house!

Help them escape!

Click on the rooms of the house to turn the lights on and off. Moths are attracted to light, use them to guide the moths to a window.

Click on a window to open or close it. But don't leave it open too long or more moths will get in!

Moths are delicate creatures. Help them get outside before they hurt themselves.
